name: Knight On Ice
description:
KNIGHT ON ICE

My first Godot project, realized for the Lost Cartridge Jam 2021

Old school C64-style game ; I seriously lacked time, so it's not quite finished yet, but still playable. You are a knight skidding on ice and throwing swords at different kinds of mobs. Why not?

Sounds : freesound.org

Sprites : www.kenney.nl

C64 font : http://style64.org/c64-truetype/license
